title: Continued: Who took which sticky tape samples where and when? 6BD Pictured?
post: Brilliant. Well found, Kelly. Case solved, probably!
author: Hugh Farey

title: Continued: Who took which sticky tape samples where and when? 6BD Pictured?
post: N° 6Bd/6BD/6 bd case UNsolved yet. In 1973, if Frei has managed to sneakily remove at least one sticky tape from the TS man right cheek area… it shoud have been from the 6Ca area not the 6Bd area… Or If Frei could not tell the TSman’s right from left, the sticky tape sample would have been referred to as N°6Bc NOT N°6Bd.
author: Max Patrick Hamon

title: Continued: Who took which sticky tape samples where and when? 6BD Pictured?
post: typo: Or If Frei could not tell the TSman’s right from left, the sticky tape sample would have been referred to as N°6Bc OR N°6Bd.
author: Max Patrick Hamon

title: Continued: Who took which sticky tape samples where and when? 6BD Pictured?
post: Is 1973 Frei’s sticky tape sample reference  a mere a slip of his byro? Most likely.

title: Continued: Who took which sticky tape samples where and when? 6BD Pictured?
post: Actually this is a slip from my “electronic byro”…
author: Max Patrick Hamon

title: Continued: Who took which sticky tape samples where and when? 6BD Pictured?
post: Additional solutions: This is not a slip of Frei’s byro as the latter would have removed a sticky sample at right cheek level (just off the face image); Frei relied on ambiguity as he wasn’t officially allowed to lift up any sample directly from the TS man’s facial area.
author: Max Patrick Hamon

title: Continued: Who took which sticky tape samples where and when? 6BD Pictured?
post: Final Solution: Frei could not  tell the TS man’s left from right. And DID remove (at least one)  sticky tape sample from  LEFT (not right) cheek area in 1973.
author: Max Patrick Hamon

title: Continued: Who took which sticky tape samples where and when? 6BD Pictured?
post: Reminder for Kearse: the anatomical right cheek area falls within 6Cd and 6Ca (not 6Bd and 6Bc)
author: Max Patrick Hamon

author: Max Patrick Hamon

title: Continued: Who took which sticky tape samples where and when? 6BD Pictured?

author: Kelly Kearse
